      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AbstractRemoteConnection.AbstractJsonValueResponseHandler<T> 
      static class  AbstractRemoteConnection.HttpResponseResourceException
      The HttpResponseResourceException wraps the ResourceException into HttpResponseException.
      class  AbstractRemoteConnection.JsonValueResponseHandler
      A ResponseHandler that returns the response body as a JsonValue for successful (2xx) responses.
      class  AbstractRemoteConnection.QueryResultResponseHandler
      A ResponseHandler that returns the response body as a String for successful (2xx) responses.
      class  AbstractRemoteConnection.ResourceResponseHandler
      A ResponseHandler that returns the response body as a Resource for successful (2xx) responses.

      • adapt

        protected static org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException adapt(Throwable t)
        Adapts an Exception to a ResourceException.
        Parameters:
        t - The exception which caused the request to fail.
        Returns:
        The equivalent resource exception.
